title: A League of Exiles
description: "We'd been deceived and betrayed - and the punishment for that was going to be swift, unforgiving, and, this time, final.They'd been spared once... We had no intention of making that mistake again."Reunite with the Shadians in A League of Exiles, the pulse-pounding Book 6 of Season 7!Buy now!Â  *Beware of spoilers in the reviews below that are without spoiler alerts*
author: Bella Forrest
